revised_title: Magnetic Study of Two-Phase Iron-Nickel Alloys and Their Equilibrium Phase Diagram
tldr: The authors conducted a magnetic study of two-phase iron-nickel alloys and investigated their equilibrium phase diagram. They found that the alloys' magnetic intensity and Curie temperature change with different annealing treatments, and they determined the equilibrium phase diagram using magnetic intensity measurements. This research helps understand the relation between irreversible changes and equilibrium conditions in these alloys.
